comment: @IpsosMORI @KCLpollingclub There is ultimately very little 'fake news'  - except in a very few instances where it refers to specific events on specific dates. The vast majority of 'news' is subjective option / analysis which is highly biased according to ownership (i.e. right wing loony press)
